metadata.Title: CVE-2014-125004 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability has been found in FFmpeg 2.0 and classified as problematic.This vulnerability affects the function decode_hextile of the filelibavcodec/vmnc.c. The manipulation leads to memory corruption. The attackcan be initiated remotely. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix thisissue.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
